body_content.explanation: the action of moving your hands as if you are holding and playing a guitar when you are not:
examples: He shows off his skills at air guitar.
Try some air guitar in your bedroom in front of the mirror.

body_content.explanation: an imaginary guitar that someone pretends to hold and play by moving their hands:
examples: He celebrated his race win by playing an air guitar in front of the crowds.
It seems people will always start up their air guitars to the sound of "Satisfaction".
